title: [Whistler's Pass, Falls]
description: Beautifully weathered grey granite channels the creek water over a ledge to the north.  Looking out over the ledge, the base of the waterfall can be seen twenty feet below.  A series of stone steps wind their way down the falls, illuminated by moonlight.
